SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: THE MORGAN CREEK FOUNDATION SEEKS TO FUND NOT-FOR-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS IN THE COMMUNITIES WHERE WE LIVE AND WORK THAT PROVIDE DISADVANTAGED CHILDREN AND YOUTH THE OPPORTUNITY TO PARTICIPATE IN ACADEMIC PROGRAMS DESIGNED TO HELP THEM DEVELOP THE SKILLS NECESSARY TO BECOME A SUCCESSFUL ADULT LATER IN LIFE AND TO CONTRIBUTE TO THE COMMUNITIES WHERE THEY CHOOSE TO LIVE IN THEIR OWN UNIQUE WAY. IN 2022 MORGAN CREEK FOUNDATION ASSISTED 17 ORGANIZATIONS.
SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description2Txt: SCHOLARSHIPS AWARDED TO GRADUATING HIGH SCHOOL STUDENTS OR INDIVIDUALS WHO HAVE OBTAINED A G.E.D., WHO WILL ATTEND A POST-SECONDARY EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION AND HAVE AN AFFILIATION WITH ONE OR MORE OF THE CURRENT OR FORMER MORGAN CREEK FOUNDATION GRANTEES (SEE ACTIVITY DESCRIBED IN ACTIVITY ONE). IN 2022 MORGAN CREEK FOUNDATION AWARDED TEN SCHOLARSHIPS.
